org.ow2.chameleon.rose.ws.internal
Class CXFExporterComp

java.lang.Object
  org.ow2.chameleon.rose.AbstractExporterComponent
      org.ow2.chameleon.rose.ws.internal.CXFExporterComp
All Implemented Interfaces:
ExporterService, ExporterIntrospection
public class CXFExporterComp
extends AbstractExporterComponent
implements ExporterService, ExporterIntrospection

This component provides a JAX-WS, Apache CXF based implementation of an ExporterService.

Author:
Jonathan Bardin

createEndpoint

protected org.osgi.service.remoteserviceadmin.EndpointDescription createEndpoint(org.osgi.framework.ServiceReference sref,
                                                                                 Map<String,Object> extraProperties)
Description copied from class: AbstractExporterComponent
Create an endpoint for the service linked to sref. If the service has already an endpoint with compatible properties, return the existing EndpointDescription, otherwise an exception must be thrown.

Specified by:
createEndpoint in class AbstractExporterComponent
Parameters:

Returns:
